DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Gadofosveset Trisodium ( Gdfos , Ablavar ) useful magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) contrast agent accurately diagnose liver metastasis compare standard agent gadobutrol ( EcGd , Gadovist ) .
DOC.brief_title: Gadofosveset Trisodium ( Ablavar , Gdfos ) Distinguishing Hemangiomas Metastases : A Prospective Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The propose study single centre , prospective trial compare sensitivity specificity use Gadofosveset Trisodium ( Gdfos , Ablavar ) MRI contrast agent compare gadobutrol ( EcGd , Gadovist ) . The study population include cancer patient 's refer MRI study liver rule metastasis . Those meet inclusion/exclusion criterion routine ( clinical ) MRI liver EcGd . They also receive additional MRI Gdfos within 4 week original study . The patient data anonymized image read radiologist radiology resident comparison make diagnostic accuracy EcGd-enhanced study Gdfos-enhanced study .
DOC.criteria: know cancer refer MRI liver rule metastases focal liver lesion age > 18 yo contraindication MRI MR contrast agent pregnancy unable obtain sequence and/or acceptable quality imaging
